data.name: Bleed Em Out
data.description: Your target suffers X physical damage over the next 10 seconds. The damage will start low, and increase as the effect continues.

data.name: Bloodlust
data.description: All your exhaustive blows restore X hit points.

data.name: Bring Da Pain!
data.description: While activated, every 4 seconds you will lose 10 action points and group members within 100 feet will gain a (Rank * 1) ability bonus to weaponskill, but take you will take a (Rank * 1) ability penalty to initiative. This effect can be stacked up to three times. When deactivated, groupmates will lose all stacks and the cooldown will begin.

data.name: Green With Fury
data.description:
For the next 5 seconds, for each enemy you successful strike with a direct damage ability, you will gain a stack of Green With Fury. After the 5 seconds is over, you will deal X physical damage to all enemies within 30 feet every 2 seconds consuming 10 stacks of Green With Fury.

This pulse effect will end when you run out of stacks.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to strength.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Can't Stop Da Chop
data.description: You chop at your enemy, dealing X physical damage and reducing the value of incoming heals on them by 50% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 7 seconds. If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Chop Fasta!
data.description: Group members within 100 feet are inspired by the way you shrug off the blows, for the next 10 seconds any ability used by your groupmates will cool down 5 seconds faster.

data.name: Chop Til You Drop
data.description: Get Stuck In's cooldown timer is lowered by 10 seconds.

data.name: Close Combat
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will receive 25% less damage from ranged and magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack.

data.name: Come and Git It!
data.description: Gain a (1 * rank) ability bonus to toughness for each enemy within 20 feet, up to a maximum of 6 enemies, for 10 seconds.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to dodge and parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Dat Tickles!
data.description: Absorbs 3600 damage for up to 20 seconds.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to spirit resistance.

data.name: Don't Go Nowhere
data.description: A maiming attack which deals X physical damage to the target and snares them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Don't Hate Da Choppa
data.description: All attacks will generate 25% less hate.

data.name: Don't Wanna Live Foreva
data.description: Gain a 120 unique bonus to strength and weaponskill and take a 120 unique penalty to toughness.

data.name: Easy Killin'
data.description: Reduces the action point costs by 5 points in furious state and 10 points in berserk state.

data.name: Extra Choppin'
data.description: Lotsa Choppin', Wild Choppin', and Yer All Bleedin' Now will strike 12 targets rather than 9.

data.name: Finish 'Em Faster
data.description: Cooldowns on your exhaustive blows are reduced by 25%.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fling Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their action points into yourself, and causing them to take a 160 morale penalty to strength for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Furious Choppin'
data.note:
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description: Deals X physical damage to the enemy. For the next 10 seconds, your autoattack speed is increased by +100% and you gain a (5 * rank) unique bonus to weaponskill.

data.name: Git Stuck In
data.description: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Auto attack speed is increased by 35% for 20 seconds for all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Green Cleavin'
data.description: You frantically lash out at everything nearby for up to 3 seconds, dealing X physical damage every 0.5 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Go For Da Soft Spot
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: You deal X physical damage to your enemy.

data.name: Hurtin' Time
data.description: While this ability is active, your melee attacks will deal an additional X physical damage , but you will also suffer Y physical damage each time.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to wounds.

data.name: I'm Still Here
data.description: Increases the durations of Come An' Git It and Try An' Hurt Me by 5 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Keep It Comin'
data.description: When you die, you will resurrect with 50% health and have 100% rage. You will deal X physical damage to enemies within 30 feet. This effect can only happen once every minute.

data.name: Keep On Choppin'
data.description: You chop deeply into your enemy, dealing X physical damage. Your love of battle fills you with energy, over the next ten seconds, you will gain 15 action points and 15 rage every second.

data.name: Long Lasta
data.description: Any time your Exhaustive Blow gets defended, for the next 6 seconds all attacks will cost 0 action points.

data.name: Hit Me 'arder!
data.description: Whenever you are struck by a ranged direct damage ability, you will hit all enemies within 30 feet for X physical damage.

data.name: Lotsa Choppin
data.description: You wildly swing at enemies in front of you within 25 feet, dealing anywhere from X physical damage to Y physical damage.

data.name: No More Helpin'
data.note:
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
A brutal attack which deals X physical damage to the target. For the next 10 seconds, any healing abilities that they use will be 50% as effective.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Outta My Face!
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds. During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 25% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Reckless Blow
data.note:
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
Deals X physical damage and for 10 seconds, your chance to be critically hit will be increased by 1%. This negative effect stacks up to 10 times.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Red goes faster!
data.description: While berserk, all cooldowns are reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for X physical damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.description: Any roots or snares are removed, as all attempts to impede your movement are futile. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Sit Down!
data.description: Deals X physical damage and knocks down the target for 3 seconds. The attack is undefendable.

data.name: Slasha
data.description: A furious slash that deals X physical damage and causes your target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to toughness for 9 seconds.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: All of your critical hits will deal 25% more bonus critical damage.

data.name: Stomp Da Yard
data.description: You stomp the ground, knocking down targets within 30 feet for 3 seconds and dealing 1800 damage.

data.name: Strong Finish
data.description: Your path of Da Hitta abilities will deal X extra physical damage each time you hit a target that is below 40% health.

data.name: Supa Chop
data.description: Deals 1800 damage and reduces Action Point costs by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Tantrum
data.description: You deal an additional 300 damage, whenever you use an ability. This effect will fade after you damage 8 targets.

data.name: Throat Slasha
data.description: You slash at your opponent's throat, immediately inflicting X physical damage. The wound continues to bleed for Y physical damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Tired Already?
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You chop your target in a vital organ, dealing X physical damage. For the next 10 seconds, any abilities that they use will take an additional 5 seconds to cooldown.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Try An' Hurt Me
data.note:
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
An exhaustive blow that deals X physical damage and reduces your target's chance to critically hit by 100% for 10 seconds.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Was Dat Yer Finger?
data.description: You will gain a (1.325 * rank) tactic bonus to weapon skill and +10% auto-attack damage for each stack of Brind Da Pain.

data.name: Weaklin' Killa
data.note:
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
You unleash a powerful blow, dealing X physical damage.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Pent Up Rage
data.description: Every 4 seconds, you will gain one stack of an effect which reduces the Rage cost of your exhaustive blows by 25%. This effect stacks up to 3 times, and using an exhaustive blow will consume one stack.

data.name: I'z Fightin' Betta
data.description:
You lose all stacks of Reckless blow and go berserk. For the next 10 seconds, you gain a (Rank * 3) morale bonus to initiative, the negative effects of berserk are nullified, you cannot dump your rage, and your offhand weapon will always strike on auto attacks.

If you are wielding a great weapon, your will gain +50% auto attack damage.

data.name: Wild Choppin'
data.note:
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You strike enemies within 30 feet, dealing anywhere from X physical damage to Y physical damage.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Wot Rules?
data.description: Exhaustive blows will no longer remove your Rage. This tactic will not effect Outta My Face!

data.name: Wot's Da Rush?
data.note:
Must be furious or berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Dual Wield
data.description:
You lash out at all enemies within 30 feet, inflicting X physical damage. All of the victims will also become snared, reducing their run speed anywhere from 10% to 40% for up to 9 seconds.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Yer All Bleedin' Now
data.description: You swipe at the enemies in front of you, dealing X physical damage every 2 seconds over 10 seconds to enemies within 40 feet.

data.name: Yer Gettin' Soft
data.description: Whenever you deal critical damage, you will gain 15% critical chance for 6 seconds, but you will gain 1 stack of Reckless Blows.

data.name: Yer Goin Down!
data.description: Your rage inspires all groupmates within 100 feet of you. Each person will gain 50% increased movement speed for 7 seconds and have 50% reduced build up times. This effect will end on each groupmate when they use an ability.
